text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
Ah… If it is here neither, then Melpomene's⁽ᴹᵘˢᵉ ᵒᶠ ᵀʳᵃᵍᵉᵈʸ⁾ 
favor… has melted into the twilight!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
Huh? What are you talking about? 
Quit messing around and get it done already.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: Oh, wise one, I've come in search of completion. The mechanical doll, having crossed paths with the demon, seeks its raison d'être and sets out on a journey to meet its creator ——

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
However, the creator, awaiting in hell, silently casts 
it aside. The mechanical doll despairs of everything, 
bidding farewell to the demon and the mansion.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: Setting off on an aimless journey in search of its raison d'être… Its sorrowful, profound statement — those last words remain undecided…!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
I don't care… We're running out of time… 
Just write something and finish it already.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
Unbelievable! Rather than treating parting lightly, 
it'd be better to let the whole be lost to time.

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
…… Hey, can I ask ya somethin'? I've been wonderin'. 
Why y'all so fixated on partin' ways like that?

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
If it ain't workin' out, just cast it aside! 
Let's wrap this up with a big happy ending. 
That'd be terrific!

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
… Oh, I see, so you're devoted to comedy. 
But, dear danseuse, my aesthetic is fixated on partings…

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
It's because of partings that our existence is deeply 
etched into the soul. It's because of partings that 
memories shine brilliantly and become cherished…

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
Everything will eventually face separation. The words 
that cut swiftly through time… They must be something 
deeply imprinted onto the heart.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
Aagh! The final line that expresses the sorrow of parting… 
What will the mechanical doll utter!?

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
Well, I ain't rightly sure! Hey, Kris S, 
what 'bout you? What do ya reckon?

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
…… Alright! The one thing we oughta 
do right now is clear as day.

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: —— Party!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Ta-da! I've baked a traditional Irish Halloween cake called Barmbrack. Help yourselves to a slice each♪

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
Woah, that looks mighty tasty♪ Thank you Fine. 
Well then, let's get this party started!

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: —— Cheers!

text_block_list.name: All 3
text_block_list.text: Cheers! To Bacchus!

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
Shakur, you too! 
Cheers! Cheers!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Enough of this already! Don't we have a script to finish?

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
Hm? I reckon I just wanna have a good ol' talk, ya know? 
We're all gathered here, like a crew on the same ship.

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
But right now, that ol' ship done come to a halt. Let's 
all work together to figure out the cause! If we lay our 
thoughts on the table, we're sure to find the answer!

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
This is just a difference in our aesthetics. I embrace farewells, 
while you adore eternity… There's no answer to it, really.

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
Just how important is that farewell to you, darlin'? 
That's all I wanna know!

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
However, Babel is already crumbling… Gasp! I see it now… 
Dear sage! Will your goddess of destiny grant us an explanation!?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Shut up, don't bother me.

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
Shakur's goddess! It's that PC, ain't it!? 
I wanna see too! Hand it over!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Shut it, quit hassling me. Or better yet, get to the point already!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: …… Hehe.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: …… Fine?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Sorry… It's truly a delight. 
To have this moment……

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
…… I do think partings can be lovely. 
They're the next step on the journey.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Indeed, partings are inevitable. However, 
for the journey ahead… I believe memories 
like these will keep us connected forever.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: Hm? What's up?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: …… Nothing.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
…… Kris S, fear not your words to be carried away 
by the wind. The night is long, and there's plenty 
of time to chase the breeze. …Go on.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
……… The moment of farewell. I think that maybe…… 
the mechanical doll won't feel sad.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: —— I know. I, too, am familiar with departures.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
Leaving behind the land where I grew up. 
…… I felt lonely.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
—— It felt the same with not getting used to a new land. 
But… I didn't feel sadness.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
Mission — I had things to accomplish. 
And…… memories.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: Because, memories… were kept in this heart.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
…… Yes. Even in the script… 
The mechanical doll has a mission.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text:
A mission to find its own purpose ―― 
If that's the case, the journey that lies ahead… 
It might be filled with memories, don't you think?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S
text_block_list.text: —— Just like…… myself.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
… I see. Perhaps Melpomene⁽ᴹᵘˢᵉ ᵒᶠ ᵀʳᵃᵍᵉᵈʸ⁾ 
didn't love me for a reason!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Gimlet?

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
O, spirit of shamrock, I was imprisoned… By the shackles 
of my own thoughts, heedlessly blind to the other side of 
the moon known as "farewell".

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
But now, I stand upon a new horizon. What was once a motif 
has taken on a life of its own…… and a completely different 
intellect has sparked within. Is it merely a role in a play?

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
Nay! This is a revelation brought forth by the force of destiny. 
Therefore, I shall accept it! Impressive! Kris S, you've now 
become a vessel for the mechanical spirit!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
You've come up with it, haven't you! 
Gimlet, what will be the final line?

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: Tsk, tsk, tsk. The climax doesn't manifest solely in a line. The key to it all… IT'S YOU, FINE!
